source: Add a player to this team

Each player or team tries to obtain more than half of the map’s area. The winner will be the player or the team that is able to keep that area for at least 20 minutes. If the peaceful mode is selected, the game ends if one player has more land than any other player could gain.
target: Jokalari edo talde bakoitza maparen azaleraren gehiengoa eskuratzen saiatuko da. Azaleraren gehiengoa gutxienez 20 minutuz mantentzeko gai dena izango da irabazlea. Modu baketsua aukeratua egon ezkero, jokoa bukatzen da jokalari batek beste inork eskura lezakeena baino azalera gehiago badauka.

source: Each player or team tries to obtain more than half of the map’s area. The winner will be the player or the team that is able to keep that area for at least 20 minutes, or the one with the most territory after 4 hours, whichever comes first. If the peaceful mode is selected, the game ends if one player has more land than any other player could gain.
target: Jokalari edo talde bakoitza maparen azaleraren gehiengoa eskuratzen saiatuko da. Azaleraren gehiengoa gutxienez 20 minutuz mantentzeko gai dena ala 4 orduren ostean lurralde gehien duena izango da irabazlea. Modu baketsua aukeratua egon ezkero, jokoa bukatzen da jokalari batek beste inork eskura lezakeena baino azalera gehiago badauka.

source: As wood gnome you like big forests, so your task is to have more trees on your territory than any other player. The game will end after 4 hours of playing. The one with the most trees at that point will win the game.
target: Egurrezko gnomo lez baso handiak maite dituzu, beraz zure betebeharra zure lurraldean beste jokalariek baino zuhaitz gehiago edukitzea da. Jokoa 4 orduren ostean amaituko da. Momentu horretan zuhaitz gehien dituenak irabaziko du.
